content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":85573,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、これがバグ、なのね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, this is a bug...\""},{"lineNumber":85574,"originalJapaneseLine":"　クエルプランが人に恋をした、ように……","translatedEnglishLine":"Like Quelplan falling in love with a human...\""},{"lineNumber":85575,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私に、真似では、ない、感情が」","translatedEnglishLine":"I have feelings that are not imitation.\""},{"lineNumber":85576,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あ、あ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-a-a...!\""},{"lineNumber":85577,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これが怒りなのね！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So this is anger!\""},{"lineNumber":85578,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これが感情というものなのね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"This is what you call emotion!\""},{"lineNumber":85579,"originalJapaneseLine":"「法王、クルックー・モフス……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Pope, Kurukku Mofusu...\""},{"lineNumber":85580,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とんでも――とんでもないことを、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You have done something outrageous—an unforgivable thing,\""},{"lineNumber":85581,"originalJapaneseLine":"　して、くれたもの、ね……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You have done this to me...!\""},{"lineNumber":85582,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人などという矮小な存在が――ッ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A petty existence like a human—!\""},{"lineNumber":85583,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あろうことか、全ての神を口先で、欺く、など！","translatedEnglishLine":"Daring to deceive all the gods with mere words!\""},{"lineNumber":85584,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まして、ましてや――ッ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And moreover—!\""},{"lineNumber":85585,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あのお方、に、命令、など――ッ！","translatedEnglishLine":"To give orders to that one—!\""},{"lineNumber":85586,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よくも、よく、も――ッ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How dare you, how dare you—!\""},{"lineNumber":85587,"originalJapaneseLine":"　騙して、くれた、わね――ッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You tricked me—!\""},{"lineNumber":85588,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":85589,"originalJapaneseLine":"「女神ALICE、一ついいですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Goddess ALICE, may I say something?\""},{"lineNumber":85590,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":85591,"originalJapaneseLine":"「騙される方が悪いんですよー、っだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's your own fault for being deceived!\""},{"lineNumber":85592,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――ッ！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":85593,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえい、ピース」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yay, peace!\""},{"lineNumber":85594,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-a...\""},{"lineNumber":85595,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よく、も……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How dare you...!\""},{"lineNumber":85596,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな、下らない、ことを……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Say something so trivial...!\""},{"lineNumber":85597,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、下らなくないわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, it's not trivial at all.\""},{"lineNumber":85598,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――愛を知らぬ迷い子がいたら愛を与えなさい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—If there is a lost child who does not know love, give them love.\""},{"lineNumber":85599,"originalJapaneseLine":"　――世界は愛で溢れているのだと訴えなさい」","translatedEnglishLine":"—Tell them that the world is overflowing with love.\""},{"lineNumber":85600,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ねえ、女神ALICE？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hey, Goddess ALICE?\""},{"lineNumber":85601,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これは貴方の教えじゃない」","translatedEnglishLine":"This is not your teaching.\""},{"lineNumber":85602,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――ッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—!\""},{"lineNumber":85603,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私はそれをするべきと提案しただけ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I only proposed that it should be done."},{"lineNumber":85604,"originalJapaneseLine":"　法王様はそれを実行に移しただけ」","translatedEnglishLine":"The Pope just put it into action.\""},{"lineNumber":85605,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、どうかお喜び下さいね、女神ALICE。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, please rejoice, Goddess ALICE."},{"lineNumber":85606,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貴方の慈悲でまた一人の迷い子が救われましたよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"By your mercy, another lost child has been saved.\""},{"lineNumber":85607,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう――","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right—"},{"lineNumber":85608,"originalJapaneseLine":"　全ては貴方のお導きのままに」","translatedEnglishLine":"Everything is according to your guidance.\""},{"lineNumber":85609,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アム・イスエル、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Amu Isuel,"},{"lineNumber":85610,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無駄に挑発しては可哀想ですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's pitiful to provoke him unnecessarily.\""},{"lineNumber":85611,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、挑発だなんて心外。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh my, saying it's provocation is quite unjust."},{"lineNumber":85612,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私はただ忠実な神の信徒であるだけなのに」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm simply a faithful worshipper of the gods.\""},{"lineNumber":85613,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今も、昔も、そしてこれからも、ね。","translatedEnglishLine":"Even now, in the past, and in the future, you see."},{"lineNumber":85614,"originalJapaneseLine":"　くすくす……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Heh heh...\""},{"lineNumber":85615,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、の――このッ――！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-this—this!!\""},{"lineNumber":85616,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほら、怒らせた」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"See, you made her angry.\""},{"lineNumber":85617,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでいいのよ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's perfectly fine..."},{"lineNumber":85618,"originalJapaneseLine":"　愛と怒りはとても近い感情なのだから」","translatedEnglishLine":"Because love and anger are very close emotions.\""},{"lineNumber":85619,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ようやく、私にも彼女が救えそうだわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Finally, it seems I might be able to save her too.\""},{"lineNumber":85620,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴方達は、歴代でも――","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You two are the worst popes in history—"},{"lineNumber":85621,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最悪の法王だわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"The absolute worst.\""},{"lineNumber":85622,"originalJapaneseLine":"吐き捨てるような女神ALICEの言葉。","translatedEnglishLine":"Words spat out disdainfully by Goddess ALICE."},{"lineNumber":85623,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人の法王はけろりとしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The two popes acted completely unfazed."},{"lineNumber":85624,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうですか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":85625,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、悲しい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh my, how sad.\""},{"lineNumber":85626,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":85627,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……抑えて下さい、女神ALICE。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Please calm down, Goddess ALICE."},{"lineNumber":85628,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ルドラサウム様の御前です」","translatedEnglishLine":"You are before Lord Rudrasaum.\""},{"lineNumber":85629,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー、母さん、悪いことしてるー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Mom, you're doing something bad—\""},{"lineNumber":85630,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっと、確かにそうですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oops, that's true indeed."},{"lineNumber":85631,"originalJapaneseLine":"　母は昔いっぱい意地悪されたので、","translatedEnglishLine":"Mother was treated meanly a lot in the past,"},{"lineNumber":85632,"originalJapaneseLine":"　思わず意地悪し返してしまいました」","translatedEnglishLine":"so she unintentionally returned the meanness.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエルプランが人に恋をした、ように……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like Quelplan falling in love with a human..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私に、真似では、ない、感情が」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have feelings that are not imitation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これが感情というものなのね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is what you call emotion!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とんでも――とんでもないことを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You have done something outrageous—an unforgivable thing,"
You have done this to me...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人などという矮小な存在が――ッ！
あろうことか、全ての神を口先で、欺く、など！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Daring to deceive all the gods with mere words!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのお方、に、命令、など――ッ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To give orders to that one—!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「騙される方が悪いんですよー、っだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's your own fault for being deceived!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな、下らない、ことを……！」
「――愛を知らぬ迷い子がいたら愛を与えなさい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—If there is a lost child who does not know love, give them love."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――世界は愛で溢れているのだと訴えなさい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —Tell them that the world is overflowing with love."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これは貴方の教えじゃない」
「私はそれをするべきと提案しただけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I only proposed that it should be done.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 法王様はそれを実行に移しただけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Pope just put it into action."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、どうかお喜び下さいね、女神ALICE。
貴方の慈悲でまた一人の迷い子が救われましたよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By your mercy, another lost child has been saved."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全ては貴方のお導きのままに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everything is according to your guidance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無駄に挑発しては可哀想ですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's pitiful to provoke him unnecessarily."
"Oh my, saying it's provocation is quite unjust.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はただ忠実な神の信徒であるだけなのに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm simply a faithful worshipper of the gods."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今も、昔も、そしてこれからも、ね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even now, in the past, and in the future, you see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愛と怒りはとても近い感情なのだから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because love and anger are very close emotions."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ようやく、私にも彼女が救えそうだわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, it seems I might be able to save her too."
"You two are the worst popes in history—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 吐き捨てるような女神ALICEの言葉。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Words spat out disdainfully by Goddess ALICE.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人の法王はけろりとしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two popes acted completely unfazed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルドラサウム様の御前です」
「あー、母さん、悪いことしてるー」
母は昔いっぱい意地悪されたので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mother was treated meanly a lot in the past,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思わず意地悪し返してしまいました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so she unintentionally returned the meanness."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
